Name: Polycaboptima+
Specifications: Size Sq Mm: 1.5 ; Color: Black ; Length: 90 ; Insulation Type: LF-FR ; Heat Resistance: 70 degrees C ; Copper Grade: 99.97% Electrolytic grade Copper ; Eco Certifications: RoHS & REACH Compliant
Key_Features: Flame retardant , Lead free PVC insulation , Energy saving construction , Rodent protection , Mositure protection , High abrasion resistance , RoHS complaint , REACH complaint , 99.97% high purity copper
Color: Black, White, Blue, Green, Red, Yellow
Full_Description: POLYCABOPTIMA+ flame retardant and lead free wires bring together the highest quality raw materials in a power saving design. POLYCABOPTIMA+ wires have a high degree of flame retardance, abrasion and chemical resistance and are made using electrolytic grade copper of the highest quality.
